channel.title: Tax Collector (Neutral Wildcard)
channel.description:
Night Ability 1: Collect Taxes Collect tax from one player, this will not affect them at all but will give you 1 gold piece
Night Ability 2: Hire Protection Spend 2 gold pieces to hire a bodyguard to protect you from harm this night
Passive: Commitment Immune to conversion by the Black Rose as you are too committed to your job, but the Cult Leader will break you RIP
Objective: Collect Tax from every living player
Lore: IDK he wants money or something
Comments: IDK
